mapper.select: select g.*, u.uuid, u.realname, c.cid, c.name from tony_user u, tony_goods g, tony_category c where g.cid = c.cid and g.uuid = u.uuid and g.status = 1 order by #{0} desc
select g.*, u.*, c.* from tony_user u, tony_goods g, tony_category c where g.cid = c.cid and g.uuid = u.uuid and g.gid = #{gid}

select res.* from (select g.gid, g.title, g.publish_time, g.content, g.buy_price, g.sell_price, g.picture, g.views, g.status, g.recommendation, u.uuid, u.realname, c.cid, c.name, rownum r from tony_user u, tony_goods g, tony_category c where g.cid = c.cid and g.uuid = u.uuid) res where r>(#{index}-1)*8 and r<=#{index}*8 order by recommendation desc
select g.* from tony_goods g, tony_user u where g.uuid = u.uuid and u.username=#{username}
mapper.update: update tony_goods set status=#{1} where gid=#{0}
update tony_goods set recommendation=1 where gid=#{gid}
update tony_goods set status=2 where gid=#{gid}
